[[File:ReaperCloth.jpg|thumb|200px|The Reaper Cloth]]
==Details==
===Description=== The Reaper Cloth costs 2,500 [[Quest Points]]. It can be bought from the [[shops]] of [[Shops#Sinnoh:_Locations_and_items|Resort Area]] in [[Sinnoh]].
===Uses=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | [[File:Dusclops.png|40px]] Dusclops || [[File:Dusknoir.png|40px]] Dusknoir |}
[[Category:Items]] [[Category:Evolution Items]]
